EmailTemplate.description: Notice of cancellation for those who have registered to attend this session
EmailTemplate.name: PD Day - CT - 2007 (Cancellation)
EmailTemplate.subject: ASAâ€™s Professional Development Day, scheduled for Wednesday, October 3, 2007 has been POST-PONED!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
American Student Assistance unfortunately has had to post-pone our Professional Development Day scheduled to take place on October 3, 2007 in Hartford, CT.
We would like to apologize for any inconvenience this cancellation may have caused. We hope to reschedule at later date.
Thanks again for your willingness to take time out of your busy schedule to join us; we look forward to seeing you at future events.
Sincerely,
American Student Assistance
